caption.center: CATHERINE F. ELDER, Plaintiff v. DANA/WIX CORPORATION, Employer,
HARTFORD SPECIALTY RISK SERVICES, Carrier, Defendants.

opinion.opinion_byline: ORDER FOR THE FULL COMMISSION BY J. HOWARD BUNN, JR., CHAIRMAN
opinion.posture: This matter is before the undersigned upon defendants' withdrawal of appeal to the Full Commission.
opinion.attorneys:
APPEARANCES
Plaintiff: Roberts Rhodes, Attorneys at Law, Gastonia, North Carolina; Scott Roberts, Counsel of Record.
Defendant: Hedrick, Eatman, Gardner Kincheloe, Attorneys at Law; Charlotte, North Carolina, Paul C. Lawrence, Counsel of Record.
* * * * * * * * * * * * * * * *
opinion.opinion_text:
Defendants gave notice of appeal to the Full Commission on April 8, 1997. Since that time, the undersigned has been advised that this appeal is being withdrawn.
IT IS THEREFORE ORDERED that defendants' appeal to the Full Commission be, and the same is hereby, WITHDRAWN.
This the _____ day of May, 1997.
FOR THE FULL COMMISSION
S/ ________________________ J. HOWARD BUNN, JR. CHAIRMAN
JHB:jmf
